channel.title: Server Help!
channel.description:
Hello, I started a server a few days ago but when i log into it this happens in the run cmd thing,
Loaded worldmap in <47 ms>... Your server is now online. connection from 127.0.0.1:5085 [client-1-myname]: loading process completed [Has powers, lag:2 ms] [client-1-myname]: Invalid server: SpiritScapePkz.no-ip.biz
I think that's why my friends cant log on. I can log on fine but when my friends try to log on it says "error connecting to server" i know i portforwarded correctly i checked at canyouseeme.org Any ideas? I have my no-ip up and running for this host [port:43594] Note: I made a webclient and one of my friends actually logged on. But it is very glitchy and i want my download client to work. please help.

item.title: Server Help!
item.dc:creator: @hadi1 hadi1
item.description:
@hadi1 wrote:

Hello,
I started a server a few days ago but when i log into it this happens in the run cmd thing,

Loaded worldmap in <47 ms>…
Your server is now online.
connection from 127.0.0.1:5085
[client-1-myname]: loading process completed [Has powers, lag:2 ms]
[client-1-myname]: Invalid server: SpiritScapePkz.no-ip.biz

I think that’s why my friends cant log on.
I can log on fine but when my friends try to log on it says “error connecting to server”
i know i portforwarded correctly i checked at canyouseeme.org
Any ideas?
I have my no-ip up and running for this host [port:43594]
Note: I made a webclient and one of my friends actually logged on. But it is very glitchy and i want my download client to work. please help.

Read full topic
